project.title: Lacework
project.contentRaw: While at Lacework, I worked on implementing entire new product lines for their cloud security offerings. This included architecting, implementing, and continuously delivering new features for Alerting, Identity Management, Resource Management, and Vulnerability Management on the web UI.
project.contentHTML: While at Lacework, I worked on implementing entire new product lines for their cloud security offerings. This included architecting, implementing, and continuously delivering new features for Alerting, Identity Management, Resource Management, and Vulnerability Management on the web UI.

This included architecting, implementing, and continuously delivering new features for Alerting, Identity Management, Resource Management, and Vulnerability Management on the web UI.

next.title: Sora

frontmatter.title: Sora
frontmatter.description: OpenAI integration for writing entire code files

next.contentRaw:
Sora was written to quickly send comments in code to OpenAI, and then write
the result back into the file. The best improvement here is being able to reference
code relative to the file you are working on.
next.contentHTML: Sora was written to quickly send comments in code to OpenAI, and then write the result back into the file. The best improvement here is being able to reference code relative to the file you are working on.
next.excerptRaw: Sora was written to quickly send comments in code to OpenAI, and then write
next.excerptHTML: Sora was written to quickly send comments in code to OpenAI, and then write

previous.title: WAX C++ NFT Tutorial

frontmatter.title: WAX C++ NFT Tutorial
frontmatter.description: WAX smart contract development course that guides developers through the process of creating a non-fungible token (NFT) smart contract.

previous.contentRaw:
This is a 22 part series on DevTo that goes through the entire process of creating
a WAX Smart Contract that interacts with AtomicAssets and the WAX RNG Oracle.

It is a great introduction to WAX smart contract development and the WAX ecosystem.
previous.contentHTML:
This is a 22 part series on DevTo that goes through the entire process of creating a WAX Smart Contract that interacts with AtomicAssets and the WAX RNG Oracle.

It is a great introduction to WAX smart contract development and the WAX ecosystem.
